# How to Make Mobile Apps Work with Azure AD Authentication

Last updated April 27, 2023 by Appdome

Learn how to Make Mobile Apps Work with Azure AD Authentication. In order to use the capabilities of Azure AD, you first need to Register Apps in Microsoft Azure Active Directory. This registration process involves giving Azure AD details about your App, such as the URL where it’s located, the URL to send replies after a user is authenticated, the URI that identifies the app, and so on.Learn how to make mobile apps work with Azure AD Authentication.

This Knowledge Base article provides step-by-step instructions to Register Apps in Microsoft Azure Active Directory.

## How to Register Apps in Microsoft Azure Active Directory

Follow these step-by-step instructions on Azure AD App Registration:

1. Login to Microsoft Azure Portal
2. Go to **Azure Active Directory**
3. Click **App registrations**
4. Click **New application registration**  
   ![Register Apps in Microsoft Azure AD](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Azure-create-an-app-800x516.png)

### Azure AD App Registration (without client secret)

1. Name the App
2. Choose “Native” type
3. Fill redirect URI (e.g. org://com.org.all)  
   ![](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Azure-create-an-app-1.png)
4. After app created, Application ID created automatically  
   ![](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Azure-create-an-app-2.png)

### Azure Active Directory App Registration (with client secret)

1. Name the App
2. Choose “Web app/ API” type
3. Fill Sign-on URL (e.g. https://com.test)  
   ![](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Azure-create-an-app-3.png)
4. After app created, Application ID created automatically
5. Click **Settings**
6. Click **keys**
7. Fill “Description” and “Expires” date
8. Click Save  
   ![Register Apps in Microsoft Azure AD - save your changes](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Azure-create-an-app-4.png)
9. After app saved, the Value created automatically (Client Secret)  
   ![](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Azure-create-an-app-5-800x355.png)

### No Coding Dependency

Using Appdome, there are no development or coding prerequisites. There is no SDK and no library to manually code or implement in the app. The Appdome technology adds the relevant standards, frameworks, and logic to the app automatically, with no manual development work at all.
